full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GRUB CHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I MCHOD GTOR BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUG BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GRUB CHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUG GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU'I ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SGRUB THABS RIN CHEN 'BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA GZHIR BYAS STE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB MING CAN GYIS SBYAR YI GE PA NI, DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA NGES PAR PHAN THOGS PAR 'GYUR CIG ,)
